author: Somayeh Soltanpour
text:
She missed her parents and family, and she felt guilty for the pain she had inflicted on them. 
“Reading Lolita in Tehran”
Why would we feel that guilt? We want to have our life, they would not let us, and then we felt the guilt instead of them😡
@azarnafisi
